descricao: Objective:The Innovative tools and business models action is aimed at encouraging the development and/or the spread of innovative tools and business models to improve the visibility, availability, audience and diversity of European works in the digital age and/or the competitiveness and/or the greening process of the European audiovisual industry.Expected resultsImprove the competitiveness of the European audiovisual industry and seize the benefits of the innovative developments in technology an
